price: 68. Ma waxaad aamin ka tihiin inuu idinla gooyo dhinac dhulka ka mid ah, ama idin ku soo diro dabeyl daran oo quruurux wadata? markaas, ma heleysaan wax idinka dhowra (cadaabka).
arabic: أَفَأَمِنتُمۡ أَن يَخۡسِفَ بِكُمۡ جَانِبَ ٱلۡبَرِّ أَوۡ يُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِبٗا ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُواْ لَكُمۡ وَكِيلًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: afa-amintum an yakhsifa bikum jāniba al-bari aw yur'sila ʿalaykum ḥāṣiban thumma lā tajidū lakum wakīlan
